original_text:
Some went down to the sea in ships,
    doing business on the great waters;
korean_text: 배들을 바다에 띄우며 큰 물에서 일을 하는 자는

sentences.original_text: Some went down to the sea in ships
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이들은 배를 타고 바다로 내려갔으며

sentences.original_text: doing business on the great waters;
